DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication of the method used to prepare a tissue sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that documents biospecimen handling information._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._The act or process of making something ready._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
